Title: The Fury
Writer: Benjamin Cavell, Bryan Cranston (created by), David Shore (created by)
Actors: Giovanni Ribisi, Marin Ireland, Shane McRae, Libe Barer
Plot: Lured by the promise of a big payday in the bail bonds office's safe, Marius tries to work the angles with Pete's family. However, he finds it more difficult than he expected to manipulate ...
